MaxWalkSpeed.Description: Base max walk speed of the Plague

TerrorRadius.Description: Base terror radius, in centimeters, of the Plague

KillerVelocityAddedToProjectileVelocityF.Description: How much of the killer's velocity is added to the projectile's velocity

VomitSecondsToCharge.Description: Maximum seconds the power can be charged

VomitDrainRate.Description: How many charges per second drain while vomiting. -1.0 will mean equal time charging and vomiting, -0.5 means double time vomiting than charging, -0.25 means four times as much vomit as charge

SicknessPercentPerProjectile.Description: How much sickness is added per projectile that hits.

SicknessGainPerSecond_Base.Description: How much sickness is added per second, if survivors are infected.

SicknessGainPerSecond_Running.Description: How much sickness is added per second, if survivors are infected and running

SicknessGainPerSecond_Walking.Description: How much sickness is added per second, if survivors are infected and walking

SicknessGainPerSecond_Crawling.Description: How much sickness is added per second, if survivors are infected and crawling

SicknessGainPerSecond_Interacting.Description: How much sickness is added per second, if survivors are infected and interacting

VomitSlowDuration.Description: Duration of SURVIVOR speed penalty while vomiting, in seconds

VomitSlowAmount.Description: Magnitude of SURVIVOR speed penalty while vomiting, in percentage

VomitChargeThreshold.Description: Minimum seconds that the vomit must be charged in order to spew

CleanseSickness_SecondsToCharge.Description: Time required for survivor to cleanse sickness at the fountain

IngestCorruption_SecondsToCharge.Description: Time required for Plague to ingest corruption at the fountain

PoolPowerDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of the pool power

SuperVomitDamagePerProjectile.Description: Percentage of the effect required to get a super vomit damage. 1.0 means 1 projectile is sufficient to deal damage

SuperVomitDecayRate.Description: How much the projectile damage count decays, per second

SuperVomitHitImmunityDuration.Description: Duration, in seconds, of immunity from super vomit after taking damage from it. Resets on every projectile hit

InteractableInfectionDuration.Description: Time, in seconds, that interactable objects are infected by the plague

UseLinkedVomitCollisionChecks.Description: Do we check the links for collisions?

LinkedVomitSplashDamageRadius.Description: Set to 0 to disable splash damage

HookSicknessResetAmount.Description: Sickness level to which survivors are reset when hooked. If it is non-zero, the survivor will still count as infected.

AllFountainsResetDelay.Description: Delay before uncorrupting a fountain when all of them are corrupted

MaximumProjectileLinkLength.Description: Past this distance, we sever the link between projectiles

StartingCorruptFountains.Description: How many fountains to corrupt at the beginning of the game

RecentlyHitByVomitDuration.Description: Time in seconds to countdown before the survivor can play the Hit By Vomit animation again.
